Package com.github.fge.lambdas

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ThrowingFunctionalInterface<T extends N,N>
    Base interface for all Throwing versions of functional interfaces
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ThrowablesFactory
    An "enum singleton" for building RuntimeException instances
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ThrowablesFactory.InstantiationException
    Exception thrown by ThrowablesFactory.get(Class, Throwable) when an instance of an exception class cannot be built
    ThrownByLambdaException
    Default exception thrown when a lambda throws a checked exception
